## generateMetadata() function

Generates a BaseTrackableMetadata object based on the parcelId and sectionId provided and deals with sourcing player info internally

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function generateMetadata(parcelId: string, sectionId: string): BaseTrackableMetadata;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  parcelId | string | Unique Identifier for the parcel |
|  sectionId | string | Unique Identifier for the section of the experience |

<b>Returns:</b>

[BaseTrackableMetadata](./dcl-analytics-tracker.basetrackablemetadata.md)

BaseTrackableMetadata with all fields filled in
